name: @dapr/dapr
description: The official Dapr (https://dapr.io) SDK for Node.js

scripts.test: npm run test:unit:all && npm run test:e2e:all
scripts.test:load:http: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol http --app-port 50001 --dapr-http-port 50000 --components-path ./test/components -- npm run test:load 'test/load'
scripts.test:e2e:all: npm run test:e2e:grpc && npm run test:e2e:http && npm run test:e2e:http:actors
scripts.test:e2e:grpc: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol grpc --app-port 50001 --dapr-grpc-port 50000 --components-path ./test/components -- jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --testMatch [ '**/test/e2e/grpc/(client).test.ts' ]
scripts.test:e2e:http: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol http --app-port 50001 --dapr-http-port 50000 --components-path ./test/components -- jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --testMatch [ '**/test/e2e/http/(client|server).test.ts' ]
scripts.test:e2e:http:actors: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol http --app-port 50001 --dapr-http-port 50000 --components-path ./test/components -- jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --testMatch [ '**/test/e2e/http/actors.test.ts' ]
scripts.test:unit:all: npm run test:unit:main && npm run test:unit:actors && npm run test:unit:logger && npm run test:unit:utils
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && nodemon --ext ".ts,.js" --watch "./src" --exec "npm run build"

author: Xavier Geerinck
